actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide for an emergency program of reforestation projects.

summary.text: Emergency Reforestation Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture, through the Forest Service, to develop a program employing individuals in projects to reforest, thin, improve timber stand, control forest fires, control insects and diseases, and prevent soil erosion and floods in national forests.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an emergency program of reforestation projects.
